about_the_game:
Equipped with the Candy Cane Crossbow, Frank West shares his holiday spirit by firing candy canes from a crossbow.

Available and pre-built in Emergency Shelter vendors (story) and Vending Machines (multiplayer). Try not to spoil your dinner.
detailed_description:
Equipped with the Candy Cane Crossbow, Frank West shares his holiday spirit by firing candy canes from a crossbow.

Available and pre-built in Emergency Shelter vendors (story) and Vending Machines (multiplayer). Try not to spoil your dinner.
name: Dead Rising 4 - Candy Cane Crossbow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400 or AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2 GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-3770 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11-compatible sound card
